https://tmrev.io/movie/52214-A Beautiful Wife 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zkxCuHPVqZg0FnB8WnQ9pIwCdQr.jpg Mariano has been married for 10 years with Miranda, a woman way out of his league. Their small-town life is disrupted by charming photographer Andrea, who is struck by Miranda's good looks and offers her a one-time modelling job. Albeit hesitant, the couple eventually accepts his invitation to the Seychelles... A Beautiful Wife
